@tom_sasse @reformthinktank @EnvAgency @DefenceHQ Like the challenge though.  Clearly can improve on crisis response structures which almost inevitably evolve to the previous crisis.

@clairexxx @nwater_care @EnvAgencyYNE @unblocktober @WearRiversTrust @TyneRiversTrust @teesriverstrust @NorthWildlife @durhamwildlife @teeswildlife @Seasaver Hi Claire, really good question. Our people find all sorts of strange items in the sewer network and I’m sure the odd face mask will have been found, but no significant numbers (yet!)🤞. Thanks 😊

@tom_sasse @reformthinktank ...Compares apples with oranges (CCS/FEMA/EMERCOM etc), underplays scale and importance of Fire and Rescue Services, @EnvAgency and others, and maybe misunderstands the formal (see @DefenceHQ 's Single Dept'l Plan) role for UK Armed Forces in support to civil authorities.
